# noaa

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of noaa is to process the data on [earthquakes](https://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/hazel/view/hazards/earthquake/event-data) and create visual representation of the data like timelines on earthquakes and maps that feature location, magnitude, deaths, etc. of the earthquakes

## Installation

You can install the released version of noaa from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("noaa")
```
